entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
